Board of Adjustment
-------------------

The Board of Adjustment is appointed by City Council.  The primary purpose of the Board of Adjustment is to make a determination regarding variances from the City's zoning ordinance.  The members are volunteer residents from the City.  
  
**Members of the Board of Adjustment are:**

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Lawrence Chapman | Chairman |
| Kevin F. Risley | Member |
| Michael Cooper | Member |
| Richard Hodge | Member |
| Vickie Driscoll | Member |
| Britton Holland | Alternate Member |
| Zeb Nash | Alternate Member |

Secretary for the Board, Annette R. Arriaga
